lead_paragraph: Zlatan Ibrahimovic bagged a hat-trick as Paris St Germain geared up for their midweek Champions League clash against Manchester City with a convincing 4-1 home Ligue 1 win over Nice on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Ibrahimovic Bags Hat-Trick for PSG, Troyes Down
headline.main: Ibrahimovic Bags Hat-Trick for PSG, Troyes Down

snippet: Zlatan Ibrahimovic bagged a hat-trick as Paris St Germain geared up for their midweek Champions League clash against Manchester City with a convincing 4-1 home Ligue 1 win over Nice on Saturday....
